p: In order to prepare whey protein solution (WPS), 10 g of whey protein was mixed with 100 ml of distilled water and stirred at a controlled temperature of 90°C until a clear mixture was obtained. Just the same amount of whey protein, glycerol was added to the solution. The amount of LPOS in the whey protein solution was 5% (v/v) (Shokri et al, ( 2015). In the whey protein solution, the 0.5% v/v concentration of B. persicum EO was applied as coating‐forming solution.
